Azerbaijan will continue our diplomatic and political efforts to resolve the Nagorno-Karabakh conflict.
The events that took place in April are a serious signal both for Armenia and those engaged in conflict resolution.
Azerbaijan positively assesses Vienna and St. Petersburg meetings. Negotiations should be meaningful, not subject to imitation
After the events in April, the conditions imposed by Armenia have not been accepted to continue negotiations.
Azerbaijan may look at the development of various mechanisms in the event of positive dynamics in the negotiations and concrete results.

We do not accept any conditions that would prejudice the rights of the Palestinians and hurt the souls of the Mavi Marmara martyrs.
We have stated three conditions for normalization to Israel, where our relations have deteriorated following the Mavi Marmara hadith which was experienced in 2010.
We have had a mutual agreement with Israel, which is the fulfillment of our conditions of apology, compensation and the improvement of the living conditions of the Gaza people.
Under the agreement, Israel will pay $ 20 million in compensation to the families of innocent siblings who were martyrs in the Mavi Marmara.
After the agreement, aid will be provided to Turkey from basic human needs, infrastructure and health to many inland Gaza via Turkey.
We will quickly take steps to breathe in Gaza and take steps to overcome many years of grievances.
The ship will reach 14,000 tons of humanitarian aid supplies to the Gaza people before the festival, and will go out on Friday.
In addition to protecting the rights of our Palestinian brothers in Gaza and the West Bank, we never forget Jerusalem and Masjid al-Aqsa.
Of course, we will continue our objections and struggle against the unlawfulness of Israel in Jerusalem and Masjid al-Aqsa.
As Turkey, we will continue to help our Palestinian brothers and sisters living in Gaza and other regions.
